parameters.toolDescription: Retrieves relevant chunks from the Tonic Living Pinecone vector store for commonly used words and phrases, incorporating data from client interviews, testimonials, and competitor insights.

parameters.content:
## Bubble webhook
**Need to have Client ID sent via webhook

## Change Search to ClientID In Production

Currently We are just searching for "Tonic Living"

## Reminder: Tagging & Filtering Client Interview Documents in Pinecone

📌 When Uploading Documents to Pinecone:

Ensure document titles include "interview" for client interview files.
Use metadata tagging to set "document_type": "interview" dynamically.
For non-interview documents, set "document_type": "general".

## Handle Error
In production add error handling for data duplication with same ID
